headline: Invitation Homes Announces Dates for Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: DALLAS, July 09, 2025--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company"), the nation's premier single-family home leasing and management company, will release its second quarter 2025 financial and operating results on Wednesday, July 30, 2025, after the market closes. The Company will host a conference call that will be webcast live on Thursday, July 31, 2025, at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time to review second quarter results, discuss recent events, and conduct a question-and-ans
